input: Imagine a self-contained, hypothetical world with only the following conditions, and without any unmentioned factors or causal relationships: Eating citrus has a direct effect on vitmain C. Vitmain C has a direct effect on curly hair. Method 1: We look directly at how eating citrus correlates with curly hair in general. Method 2: We look at this correlation case by case according to vitmain C. To understand how eating citrus affects curly hair, is it more correct to use the Method 1 than Method 2?
